LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.label: Timer Switch
LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.description: Research an timer for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching at specific times.
LanguageData.ResearchTimerSwitch.descriptionDiscovere:
Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch at specified times.
NOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!
